title: Michelle O’Neill – 2022 Speech on Being First Minister for All
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Michelle O’Neill, the First Minister Designate in Northern Ireland, on 5 November 2022.
content:
Míle buíochas do gach duine as bheith linn inniu. Tá fáilte mhór romhaibh uilig.
